channel.title: Help please?
channel.description:
I'm very new to all this stuff, so I'd like to learn about java/coding, etc.
I have a few questions.
How do I get range and mage to work? Please just get me started, I'd like to learn and be helped.
How do I get weapons to be equipped correctly?
Thanks

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Either the file or the loading process is bad.
Check both of them.

I won’t spoonfeed you.[/quote]

Not like I want you to?

Anyways, twohanded.dat is empty.

So my idea was to put like:

Item = 4718

But how would I specify if it is or isn’t two-handed?

Like

Item = 4755 = No?

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Help please?
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Problem 1: Search bar.
Problem 2: Item.java (if 317).[/quote]

Alright, I’m in item.java.

I see something that says:

data/twohanded.dat .Critical error while loading twohanded!

What do I do?

Read full topic
